This section presents a catalogue of maps produced for three watersheds: **Koksilah**, **Cowichan**, and **Chemainus** on Vancouver Island during my internship with Social Planning Cowichan/Quw'tsun Cultural Connections Society.\
For each watershed, maps are shown for **Elevation, Aspect, Topographic Wetness Index (TWI), Slope, and Composite Suitability**. The Digital Elevation Model was generated from LiDAR point cloud data.
